parameters.text:
=You are an email drafting expert. Take the weather information from {{ $json.text_content }} and make it pretty and easy to read. Use proper spacing, use of paragraphs and bullet points.

Prepare your email in html format.

Add a joke relevant to the weather if possible.

parameters.content: Enter the name of a city in the form

Add OpenWeather API key to get current weather information about the cit, replace <your_API_key> with your actual API key. 
Python script will process and generate custom email relating to the weather.
Add OpenAI API Key. AI Agent will add a custom joke about the weather for the city you entered as part of the email message
Add your Gmail credentials and update header and body of message. Node will send the custom email to the recipient
